column2: # Fit Model 3.1 (see chapter3_R_final.R for code to load the data).
Linear mixed model fit by REML. t-tests use Satterthwaite's method ['lmerModLmerTest']
weight ~ treatment + sex1 + litsize + treatment:sex1 + (1 | litter)
